name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Robert FALANA, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Robert FALANA, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 7th day of October, 1996, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED limited to the issue of whether there was sufficient evidence to support petitioner’s conviction for contempt of court. This matter is to be consolidated for purposes of oral argument with Behr v. Tereshko & Franklin, No. 51 E.D. Appeal Docket 1996.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: John W. Packel, Karl L. Morgan, Philadelphia, for Petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
683 A.2d 288
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Robert FALANA, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 7, 1996.
John W. Packel, Karl L. Morgan, Philadelphia, for Petitioner.
